short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to manually or automatically input lead information and submit it to your Ringy account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Ringy extension allows you to link your account with other CRMs and be able to port leads over to follow-up with inside of the Ringy platform.
